name.en: Secret File 33 - Noble Death of Resentment
name.ja: <ruby>秘<rt>ひ</rt></ruby><ruby>密<rt>みつ</rt></ruby>FILE33-<ruby>怨<rt>うら</rt></ruby>みの<ruby>散<rt>さん</rt></ruby><ruby>華<rt>げ</rt></ruby>
name.ja_romaji: Himitsu Fairu Sanjūsan - Urami no Sange

requirement.en: When an opponent's monster declares an attack, shuffle 3 Level 3 or higher Reptile Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: The attacking monster loses 3000 ATK until the end of this turn.
